content: Vale performed a great price realization in the first quarter, driven by 4 main reasons: the first one, the cost of the coke, we need a necessity -- we have a necessity to optimize the cost of energy in the blast furnace; second, the lack of quality that are coming from our competitors, we have high silica aluminum, high aluminum, less concentrate coming from CIS, and even the domestic market, we have a lower production for the concentrate; third, pellet premiums; and finally, we are taking advantage of our portfolio.
